IframeWhiteListUrl.name: IframeWhiteListUrl
IframeWhiteListUrl.description: Represents a list of trusted external domains that you allow to frame your Embedded Service, Surveys, and Visualforce pages.

Context.description: The type of content in the iframe.

Url.description: The unique domain that is allowed to frame your Visualforce pages, surveys, or Disclosure and Compliance Hub Connector. Accepts these formats: example.com, *example.com, and https://example.com.
